changelog.title: CLH Curriculum Expanded
changelog.description: Command Line Hacker modules 005-009 now live: Process Investigation, Permissions, Scripting Basics, Advanced Scripting, and System Administration.

changelog.title: Security Skills Track
changelog.description: New modules teach SUID hunting, cron persistence detection, /etc/shadow analysis, and production-grade bash scripting patterns.

changelog.title: CLI Specialist Title
changelog.description: Complete CLH-007 through CLH-009 to earn the CLI Specialist title. Full curriculum now 10 of 15 modules available.

changelog.title: Trail Hunter System
changelog.description: Ethereal Patronus guides appear when you begin a hunt. Follow the White Rabbit to learn skills needed for Gate 1.
